titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Baroness Margaret Thatcher, former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/9/2013--Passed House without amendment. States that the House of Representatives: (1) has learned with profound sorrow of the death of Baroness Margaret Thatcher, former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland and recipient of the Presidential Medal of Freedom; and (2) tenders its sympathies to her family and countrymen. Honors the legacy of Baroness Margaret Thatcher for her commitment to advancing freedom and democracy and for her friendship to the United States. Requests the Secretary of State to communicate these expressions of sentiment to the family of the deceased and to the Parliament of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland. States that when the House adjourns on this day it do so as a mark of respect to the late Baroness Margaret Thatcher's memory.
